over the past two years. the mint-green, one-family detached colonial sits on 92nd st., near elmhurst ave. it's been in the guerrier family since 1969, shortly after they immigrated from haiti two years earlier. i think[ filming here] is a big plus because it shows people who watch the show the cosmopolitan nature of queens, says guerrier.
